title: Proactiv Solution 3 Step System Kit, 2 Month Supply
description:
Our basic clear skin kit includes full-size bottles of the essential Proactiv Solution system. This system, developed by dermatologists, uses Combination TherapyTM to help heal and stop breakouts at their source.

Includes: 
Renewing Cleanser to wash away excess oil and dirt

Revitalizing Toner to balance skin tone

Repairing Lotion to help attack bacteria

title: Proactiv Solution Revitalizing Toner 4 oz.
description:
Step two of our Proactiv Solution daily essentials, this refreshing, alcohol-free toner helps balance skin tone and remove dead skin cells to reveal the vital, radiant skin beneath. 
Size: 4 oz.

Benefits: 
Our special formulation balances skin's natural acids

Witch hazel refines and purifies pores

Aloe and chamomile soothe and soften

Allantoin stimulates the grown of healthy tissue

Removes excess surface oil without drying

title: Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser, For all skin types, 16-Ounce Bottles (Pack of 2)
